trans-unit.source: Trimming and removing characters from strings
trans-unit.target: 修剪和移除字串中的字元

trans-unit.source: Trimming and removing characters from strings
trans-unit.target: 修剪和移除字串中的字元

trans-unit.source: .NET, .NET Core
trans-unit.target: .NET, .NET Core

trans-unit.source: Trimming and removing characters from strings
trans-unit.target: 修剪和移除字串中的字元

trans-unit.source: If you are parsing a sentence into individual words, you might end up with words that have blank spaces (also called white spaces) on either end of the word.
trans-unit.target: 如果您將句子剖析成個別文字，最後可能會得到許多文字，但文字任一端有空格 (也稱為空白字元)。

trans-unit.source: In this situation, you can use one of the trim methods in the [System.String](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.String) class to remove any number of spaces or other characters from a specified position in the string.
trans-unit.target: 在這種情況下，您可以使用 [System.String](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.String) 類別中的其中一個 Trim 方法，從字串中的指定位置移除任意數目的空格或其他字元。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the available trim methods.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述可用的 Trim 方法。

trans-unit.source: Method name
trans-unit.target: 方法名稱

trans-unit.source: Use
trans-unit.target: 用法

trans-unit.source: [String.Trim](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.String.Trim)
trans-unit.target: [String.Trim](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.String.Trim)

trans-unit.source: Removes white spaces or characters specified in an array of characters from the beginning and end of a string.
trans-unit.target: 將字元陣列中字串開頭和結尾指定的空格或空白字元移除。

trans-unit.source: [String.TrimEnd](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.String.TrimEnd(System.Char[]))
trans-unit.target: [String.TrimEnd](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.String.TrimEnd(System.Char[]))

trans-unit.source: Removes characters specified in an array of characters from the end of a string.
trans-unit.target: 從字串尾端移除字元陣列中指定的字元。

trans-unit.source: [String.TrimStart](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.String.TrimStart(System.Char[]))
trans-unit.target: [String.TrimStart](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.String.TrimStart(System.Char[]))

trans-unit.source: Removes characters specified in an array of characters from the beginning of a string.
trans-unit.target: 從字串開頭移除字元陣列中指定的字元。

trans-unit.source: [String.Remove](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.String.Remove(System.Int32))
trans-unit.target: [String.Remove](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.String.Remove(System.Int32))

trans-unit.source: Removes a specified number of characters from a specified index position in a string.
trans-unit.target: 從字串中指定的索引位置移除指定的字元數。

trans-unit.source: Trim
trans-unit.target: Trim

trans-unit.source: You can easily remove white spaces from both ends of a string by using the [String.Trim](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.String.Trim) method, as shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 [String.Trim](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.String.Trim) 方法，輕鬆地移除字串頭尾的空格，如下列範例所示。

trans-unit.source: You can also remove characters that you specify in a character array from the beginning and end of a string.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以將字元陣列中字串開頭和結尾指定的字元移除。

trans-unit.source: The following example removes white-space characters, periods, and asterisks.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例將會移除空白字元、句號和星號。

trans-unit.source: TrimEnd
trans-unit.target: TrimEnd

trans-unit.source: The [String.TrimEnd](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.String.TrimEnd(System.Char[])) method removes characters from the end of a string, creating a new string object.
trans-unit.target: [String.TrimEnd](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.String.TrimEnd(System.Char[])) 方法會從字串結尾移除字元，並建立新的字串物件。

trans-unit.source: An array of characters is passed to this method to specify the characters to be removed.
trans-unit.target: 系統會將字元陣列傳遞給這個方法，以指定要移除的字元。

trans-unit.source: The order of the elements in the character array does not affect the trim operation.
trans-unit.target: 字元陣列中的項目順序不會影響修剪作業。

trans-unit.source: The trim stops when a character not specified in the array is found.
trans-unit.target: 一旦找到陣列中未指定的字元時，修剪作業就會停止。

trans-unit.source: The following example removes the last letters of a string using the TrimEnd method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用 TrimEnd 方法，移除字串的最後一個字母。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the position of the `'r'` character and the `'W'` character are reversed to illustrate that the order of characters in the array does not matter.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，`'r'` 字元和 `'W'` 字元的位置顛倒，用以說明字元陣列中的順序並不重要。

trans-unit.source: Notice that this code removes the last word of `MyString` plus part of the first.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，此程式碼會移除 `MyString` 的最後一個字以及第一個字的一部分。

trans-unit.source: This code displays `He` to the console.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼會讓主控台顯示 `He`。

trans-unit.source: The following example removes the last word of a string using the [TrimEnd](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.String.TrimEnd(System.Char[])) method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用 [TrimEnd](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.String.TrimEnd(System.Char[])) 方法，移除字串的最後一個文字。

trans-unit.source: In this code, a comma follows the word `Hello` and, because the comma is not specified in the array of characters to trim, the trim ends at the comma.
trans-unit.target: 在這個程式碼中，`Hello` 文字後接一個逗號，不過由於要修剪的字元陣列中未指定逗號，因此修剪作業會在逗號處停止。

trans-unit.source: This code displays `Hello,` to the console.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼會讓主控台顯示 `Hello,`。

trans-unit.source: TrimStart
trans-unit.target: TrimStart

trans-unit.source: The [String.TrimStart](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.String.TrimStart(System.Char[])) method is similar to the [String.TrimEnd](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.String.TrimEnd(System.Char[])) method except that it creates a new string by removing characters from the beginning of an existing string object.
trans-unit.target: [String.TrimStart](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.String.TrimStart(System.Char[])) 方法與 [String.TrimEnd](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.String.TrimEnd(System.Char[])) 方法類似，只是它會移除現有字串物件開頭的字元以建立新字串。

trans-unit.source: An array of characters is passed to the [TrimStart](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.String.TrimStart(System.Char[])) method to specify the characters to be removed.
trans-unit.target: 系統會將字元陣列傳遞給 [TrimStart](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.String.TrimStart(System.Char[])) 方法，以指定要移除的字元。

trans-unit.source: As with the [TrimEnd](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.String.TrimEnd(System.Char[])) method, the order of the elements in the character array does not affect the trim operation.
trans-unit.target: 使用 [TrimEnd](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.String.TrimEnd(System.Char[])) 時，字元陣列中的項目順序不會影響修剪作業。

trans-unit.source: The trim stops when a character not specified in the array is found.
trans-unit.target: 一旦找到陣列中未指定的字元時，修剪作業就會停止。

trans-unit.source: The following example removes the first word of a string.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會移除字串的第一個文字。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the position of the `'l'` character and the `'H'` character are reversed to illustrate that the order of characters in the array does not matter.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，`'l'` 字元和 `'H'` 字元的位置顛倒，用以說明字元陣列中的順序並不重要。

trans-unit.source: This code displays `World!` to the console.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼會讓主控台顯示 `World!`。

trans-unit.source: Remove
trans-unit.target: 移除

trans-unit.source: The [String.Remove](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.String.Remove(System.Int32)) method removes a specified number of characters that begin at a specified position in an existing string.
trans-unit.target: [String.Remove](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.String.Remove(System.Int32)) 方法會從現有字串中的指定位置開始，移除指定的字元數。

trans-unit.source: This method assumes a zero-based index.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會假設以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The following example removes ten characters from a string beginning at position five of a zero-based index of the string.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會於字串中以零為起始之索引的位置五開始，從字串中移除 10 個字元。

trans-unit.source: You can also remove a specified character or substring from a string by calling the [String.Replace(String, String)](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.String.Replace(System.String,System.String)) method and specifying an empty string ([String.Empty](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.String.Empty)) as the replacement.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以從字串中移除指定的字元或子字串，方法是呼叫 [String.Replace(String, String)](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.String.Replace(System.String,System.String)) 方法並指定空字串 ([String.Empty](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/core/api/System.String.Empty)) 做為取代。

trans-unit.source: The following example removes all commas from a string.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例將會從字串中移除所有逗號。

trans-unit.source: See Also
trans-unit.target: 另請參閱

trans-unit.source: [Basic string operations](basic-string-operations.md)
trans-unit.target: [基本字串作業](basic-string-operations.md)
